#search-bar {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  margin: auto;
  width: 200px;
  background: black;
  height: 50px;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
#search-bar input {
  width: 190px;
  margin: auto;
  line-height: 28px;
  display: block;
  padding: 10px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border-radius: 4px;
  border: none;
}
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  #search-bar {
    bottom: 0;
    margin: 0;
    top: auto;
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
  #search-bar input {
    padding: 0 10px;
    line-height: 30px;
    width: 95%;
  }
}
#smart-search {
  position: fixed;
  background: #f1f1ec;
  box-shadow: 5px 4px 9px 0px #191919;
  width: 240px;
  padding: 10px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
#smart-search #smart-search-text {
  margin: 10px 0;
  width: 212px;
  padding: 5px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
#smart-search #smart-search-title {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 5px;
  font-size: 20px;
}

  margin: 5px;
  font-size: 18px;
  text-align: center;
}

  display: inline-block;
  text-align: center;
}
